comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Aristide Briand, 28 March 1862 – 7 March 1932) was a French statesman who served eleven terms as Prime Minister of France during the French Third Republic and was a co-laureate of the 1926 Nobel Peace Prize." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aristide_Briand

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks for providing the fuller name and dates for the man in this photograph. We'll add the information to the record when we update.
